title: What's new in version 1.5.2
text:
‚Ä¢ Fixing an issue with 2Miner's reward estimations

title: Please, rate this app!
text: If you're feeling generous with your time, please support me by leaving a nice review in the App Store. As an independent developer, it means the world to me. Thank you!

title: What's new in version 1.5.1
text:
‚Ä¢ Now you can manually set a payout limit for Hiveon pool miners
‚Ä¢ Fixing an issue in Ezil pool that prevented ETH only miners from seeing the stats 
‚Ä¢ More bug fixes and interface improvements
